context_bundle.summary: Group Policy Object management for centralized Windows configuration, security baseline enforcement, and software deployment in Active Directory environments

onboarding.quick_start: Create GPOs via Group Policy Editor, link to OUs, enforce security baselines, deploy software, and use LGPO tool for mass deployment
common_patterns: OU structure design: Separate users and computers by department/location
Default Domain Policy: Use ONLY for account/password/Kerberos policies
Performance: Disable unused user/computer configurations, link at OU level
Software deployment: MSI packages install silently when assigned via GPO
LGPO tool for batch GPO application and testing
known_errors: Block inheritance used sparingly to avoid policy conflicts
Large GPOs process faster but harder to troubleshoot
Group Policy refreshes every 90 minutes by default
